001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage;
002
003import java.util.function.Function;
004
005/**
006 * A concrete implementation of {@link DataExtractor} for extracting typed data from a raw object.
007 *
008 * <p>This class allows for flexible data extraction by applying a custom function to
009 * the retrieved storage object. It optionally supports a sub-key for nested or
010 * segmented data structures.
011 * <br><br>
012 * Generic Type {@code T}: the type of data to be extracted from the raw object.
013 *
014 * <p>You can construct this class either with a sub-key or without it, depending on
015 * how nested your data structure is. The {@code extractionLogic} function defines
016 * exactly how the raw object is converted into the typed result {@code T}.
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020public class DataExtractorImpl<T> implements DataExtractor<T> {
021
022   private Enum<?> subKey;
023   private final Enum<?> key;
024   private final Function<Object, T> extractionLogic;
025
026   /**
027    * Constructs a new {@code DataExtractorImpl} with a sub-key, primary key, and extraction logic.
028    *
029    * @param subKey          an optional sub-key used for nested data extraction
030    * @param key             the primary key identifying the data to be extracted
031    * @param extractionLogic a function that transforms the raw object into a typed result
032    */
033   public DataExtractorImpl(Enum<?> subKey,
034                            Enum<?> key,
035                            Function<Object, T> extractionLogic) {
036      this.subKey = subKey;
037      this.key = key;
038      this.extractionLogic = extractionLogic;
039   }
040
041   /**
042    * Constructs a new {@code DataExtractorImpl} without a sub-key, using only a primary key.
043    *
044    * @param key             the primary key identifying the data to be extracted
045    * @param extractionLogic a function that transforms the raw object into a typed result
046    */
047   public DataExtractorImpl(
048         Enum<?> key,
049         Function<Object, T> extractionLogic) {
050      this.key = key;
051      this.extractionLogic = extractionLogic;
052   }
053
054   /**
055    * Retrieves the optional sub-key used for nested data extraction.
056    *
057    * @return an {@link Enum} representing the sub-key, or {@code null} if not used
058    */
059   @Override
060   public Enum<?> getSubKey() {
061      return subKey;
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Retrieves the primary key identifying the data to be extracted.
066    *
067    * @return an {@link Enum} representing the primary key
068    */
069   @Override
070   public Enum<?> getKey() {
071      return key;
072   }
073
074   /**
075    * Extracts and transforms the provided raw object into the target type {@code T}.
076    *
077    * @param rawObject the raw object retrieved from storage
078    * @return the extracted data of type {@code T}
079    */
080   @Override
081   public T extract(Object rawObject) {
082      return extractionLogic.apply(rawObject);
083   }
084
085}
